<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_app</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Set Related Lists To Scratchpad</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[// If navigate to existing app editor form then set the appId and its its related tables to the scratchpad // If create app form then set the appId on the scratchpad to nil var lists = []; // get the related list entries on this page var relatedList = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_related_list_entry'); relatedList.addQuery('list_id.name', current.getTableName()); relatedList.query(); while(relatedList.next()) lists.push(relatedList.related_list.toString());
// add related lists and current app id to scratchpad g_scratchpad.app_related_lists = { appId: !current.isNewRecord() ? current.sys_id.toString() : "", lists: lists };
//Need to know if related lists are deferred or not g_scratchpad.deferred_list = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.defer_related_lists');]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-11-13 22:42:13</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2704c9b3bf213000421cdc2ecf07397d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Related Lists To Scratchpad</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="System Applications Core" source="com.snc.apps">b5a334643c31311068bcf327dfe37f63</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2704c9b3bf213000421cdc2ecf07397d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2704c9b3bf213000421cdc2ecf07397d"/> </record_update>
